article_metadata.title: Blue Cross: Refunds, fixes coming this week | The Charlotte Observer

og.description: Thousands of North Carolina customers of Blue Cross and Blue Shield can expect refunds and other insurance fixes this week as the Chapel Hill insurer works through what company officials are acknowledging as their most serious system failure in recent decades.
